title: When are the London Marathon ballot results for 2020?
text:
This year’s ballot for the London Marathon was the most popular yet (Picture: Leo Mason – Split Second/Corbis via Getty Images)

The London Marathon in 2020 will be the 40th anniversary for the famous race, which is the most popular marathon on earth.

As such, competition for a place in the race around the UK’s capital city is tough, and this year a world record number of people entered the ballot for the London Marathon.

Over 457,860 people entered the ballot hoping for a spot in the 2020 race from both the UK and abroad, an increase of 25,860 (7.4 per cent) on the 347,876 last year.

So, if you entered your name into the running, when will you find out if you’ve got a place in the London Marathon ballot results for 2020?

When are the London Marathon ballot results for 2020?

All those who entered the ballot for a place in the London Marathon in 2020 will find out whether or not they have been successful by the end of this month, October 2019.

The 2020 Virgin Money Marathon announced via their official Twitter page this morning that ballot results for next year’s race will start to drop as early as this week.

Ballot results for the 2020 Virgin Money London Marathon will start to drop this week! If you haven't heard by Friday 11 October then please contact our Helpdesk on: 020 7902 0200. Best of luck to everyone who has entered!🤞#LondonMarathon pic.twitter.com/GW11cDgN6p — Virgin Money London Marathon (@LondonMarathon) October 7, 2019

They advise that anyone who hasn’t heard whether or not they have secured a place in the marathon by Friday October 11 to contact the Virgin Money Marathon helpdesk on 020 7902 0200.

The official website promises all applicants will know the status of their application by the end of the month, so if the helpdesk is unable to inform you straight away when you phone, you can rest assured you’ll know by October 31.

Everyone from the UK who gets a place to run the marathon in the ballot is sent a Congratulations magazine by Virgin to let them know they have secured a spot in the 2020 race.

The 2020 Virgin Money London Marathon will take place on Sunday 26 April next year.
